title: Mexico Lavish 17th-Century Hacienda with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner & Spa Credit
description:
Tucked away in Mexico's heartland, this hacienda showcases astonishing colonial architecture, Instagram-worthy courtyards with bubbling fountains and bespoke rooms fit for design magazines. The showstoppers? A sparkling pool encircled by green landscapes and a traditional restaurant serving up a mix of Yucatecan and European flavours.

A stone's throw from Mexico's most magical towns, this hacienda puts you in a prime position for adventure while feeling worlds away from everyday chaos. Start your morning on your private terrace, spend afternoons being pampered at the exquisite onsite spa, then sip mezcal cocktails under star-filled skies.
location_description: Hacienda Santa Rosa de Lima, an IHG Hotel
